The missing half of your React app
==================================

Convex is the open-source reactive database for app developers.

[Get started](https://www.convex.dev/start)

![Image 5](blob:https://www.convex.dev/4e8cec1af115b53260f58730269f03ca)

npm _create convex@latest_

Everything is code
------------------

From database schemas to queries, from auth to APIs, express every part of your backend in pure TypeScript. Your backend code lives next to your app code, is typechecked and autocompleted, and is generated by AI with exceptional accuracy.

![Image 6: Screenshot of code editor](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo1-code.6314d635.png&w=1536&q=75)![Image 7: Screenshot of app preview and Convex dashboard](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo1-result.c8f1598d.png&w=1536&q=75)

Always in sync
--------------

Convex libraries guarantee that your app always reflects changes to your frontend code, backend code, and database state in real time. No need for state managers, cache invalidation policies, or websockets.

![Image 8: Screenshot of code editor](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo2-code.b068f566.png&w=1536&q=75)![Image 9: Screenshot of app preview and Convex dashboard](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo2-result.cf09de86.png&w=1536&q=75)

Backend built-ins
-----------------

Create cron jobs, kick off backend AI workflows, leverage built-in auth, and tap into a growing ecosystem of components that solve common backend needs with just an `npm i`.

![Image 10: Screenshot of code editor](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo3-code.4c5200cb.png&w=1536&q=75)![Image 11: Screenshot of app preview and Convex dashboard](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdemo3-result.ce3b8080.png&w=1536&q=75)

"categorize todos",

{ seconds: 5 },

internal.categorize.categorize,

// Add categories "Sports" and "Health"

// to see the todos categorized on the

// next cron job run.

categories: \["Chores", "Work"\],

},

);

  

export default crons;

Designed for AI coding
----------------------

With Convex, everything is just TypeScript. This means your favorite AI tools are pre-equipped to generate high quality code.

[Learn more](https://www.convex.dev/ai)

Not just a database
-------------------

Everything your product deserves to build, launch, and scale.

[Learn more](https://docs.convex.dev/)

![Image 21](https://www.convex.dev/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdiagram-narrow.db9eec88.png&w=1280&q=90)![Image 22](blob:https://www.convex.dev/493fd96c43f56f510217a61576a1dd8c)

Built to go the distance
------------------------

Built by a team of experts who have designed and run some of the industry’s highest-scale, most reliable databases. When your project takes off and the stakes get high, Convex is ready.

*   Full ACID transactions, relational tables
*   Data-race freedom and the strongest possible end-to-end state consistency
*   SOC-2, HIPAA, GDPR compliant
*   Automated snapshot backup/restore, production telemetry
*   Integrations with the world-class services you love, like Clerk, Datadog, Netlify, Vercel

![Image 25](blob:https://www.convex.dev/5e3cf45241d05b4f69dbefe57d8be208)
